resource.name: HIVScreening
resource.title: NACHC HIV Screening
resource.publisher: National Association of Community Health Centers, Inc. (NACHC)
resource.description: This PlanDefinition defines a Clinical Decision Support rule to determine whether HIV Screening is appropriate based on CDC Recommendations for HIV Screening
resource.purpose: The purpose of this is to identify and build CDS support for HIV Screening.
resource.usage: This is to be used in conjunction with a patient-facing FHIR application.
resource.copyright: © Copyright National Association of Community Health Centers, Inc. (NACHC) 2021+.

action.title: Never Tested Recommendation
action.description: Perform CDC Recommendation for Never Tested Treatment if conditions are met.

expression.description: Determine if Patient is in msm population.
Provides Recommendation for Never Tested screenings.
Provides Rationale for Never Tested screenings.

action.description: Will perform HIV screening
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - Snooze 1 month.
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - Snooze 12 months.
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - patient declined.

action.title: MSM Recommendation
action.description: Perform CDC Recommendation for MSM if conditions are met for either 3 month or annual testing.

expression.description: Determine if Patient is in msm population.

action.description: Will perform HIV screening
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - Snooze 1 month.
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - Snooze 12 months.
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - patient declined.

action.title: Pregnancy Recommendation
action.description: Perform CDC Recommendation for Pregnancy if conditions are met for first prenatal visit or third trimester high risk testing.

expression.description: Determine if Patient is in msm population.

action.description: Will perform HIV screening
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - Snooze 1 month.
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - Snooze 12 months.
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - patient declined.

action.title: Seeking Treatment Recommendation
action.description: Perform CDC Recommendation for Seeking STD Treatment if conditions are met.

expression.description: Determine if Patient is in msm population.
Provides Recommendation for Seeking STD Treatment screenings.
Provides Rationale for Seeking STD Treatment screenings.

action.description: Will perform HIV screening
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - Snooze 1 month.
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - Snooze 12 months.
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - patient declined.

action.title: Risk Level Recommendation
action.description: Determines type of recommendation based on risk level regarding status of HIV Screening.

expression.description: Determine if Patient is in screening population.
Determines what recommendation patient should be provided.

action.description: Will perform HIV screening
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - Snooze 1 month.
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - Snooze 12 months.
Will not perform HIV screening at this time - patient declined.

action.title: Exclusion from HIV Screening
action.description: Determines if patient was excluded from HIV Screening Recommendation.

expression.description: Determine if Patient is in hiv exclusion population.
Rationale for why patient was excluded from the hiv screening.

resource.name: HIVScreening
resource.title: Library - HIV Screening
resource.publisher: National Association of Community Health Centers, Inc. (NACHC)
resource.description: Logic library for implementation of the CDC HIV Screening Recommendation.
resource.purpose: The purpose of this is to implement a Clinical Decision Support Workflow via CDS-Hooks to establish the CDC's HIV Screening Recommendation.
resource.usage: This is to be used in conjunction with a patient-facing FHIR application.
resource.copyright: © Copyright National Association of Community Health Centers, Inc. (NACHC) 2021+.
